name: If My Heart Had Wings -Flight Diary-
description: While If My Heart Had Wings -Flight Diary- is technically a fan disc for If My Heart Had Wings, it includes six stories - including the prologue and epilogue to the main story - and acts as a sort of sequel to the original.
minimum_requirements: 最低配備: 作業系統: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10 處理器: Intel Core2Duo or higher 記憶體: 2 GB 記憶體 顯示卡: Intel HD graphics or higher (VRAM 512MB) 儲存空間: 4 GB 可用空間 備註: An environment that can display at least 1280×720 pixels Recommended Environment:  *When using display adapters that share main memory, the game may not work. *We do not guarantee that this game will run on virtual drives or Virtual PCs (including Apple Boot Camp). *This product uses Ogg Vorbis/Lua/tilua++.
